name: Hotdog's Clickin Game (V1.3)
description:
You click things very fast to buy more things to click faster to buy more things to click faster to buy more things to click faster to buy more things to click faster to buy more things to click faster to buy more things to click faster to buy more things to click faster to buy more things and on and on and on

Plz subscribe to my Youtube if you enjoy :) https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKhRm8klDao9Nq0aBC0KmBw

Latest Update (V1.4)

TO-THE-MAX UPDATE!

Added a lvl cap at lvl 50 for every hero. Once this is reached you can't upgrade them anymore and you've won the game (I guess...)
